channel.title: Projects on Himalaya's Dev Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Himalaya's Dev Journal

item.title: Windows on Arm Pitfalls
item.description: A brief guide to common issues when running Windows on ARM devices. Covers app compatibility gaps, driver limitations, and performance caveats.

item.title: Cross-platform dotfiles using chezmoi
item.description: A portable dotfile setup automated with chezmoi, enabling consistent configuration across machines. Includes templating, secrets handling, and reproducible environment setup.

item.title: Windows Productivity Setup
item.description: A productivity setup for software developers
